title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Programming preliminaries, some simple programs in C, numeric constants and variables, arithmetic expressions, input and output, conditional statements, loops, arrays, logical expressions, functions, character strings, enumerated data type and stacks, structures, pointer data type, lists and trees, recursion, bit level operations, files in C, miscellaneous features of C.
